title: New Creator: Christopher "MonteCristo" Mykles
body:
Name: Christopher "MonteCristo" Mykles

Socials: https://twitter.com/montecristo (300k) https://www.twitch.tv/montecristo (63k) https://discord.gg/EPxtrNh (2k)

Info: MonteCristo is a well-known commentator, coach, commissioner, and content creator from the League of Legends, Overwatch, and general esports communities. MonteCristo is known for his industry insight as well as spicy Twitter and highly active Discord.

Use Case: MonteCristo is planning the relaunch of his Twitch to be focused heavily on interaction and fan engagement, and has built a content plan with $MONTE Coin at its center. His Coin will be used for influencing content and game decisions on the stream, as well as other rewards programs for his fans including use of the Discord bot for gated $MONTE Coin channels and roles.

Community Treasury Grant Tier: $500

A "Yes" vote would approve Christopher "MonteCristo" Mykles as a creator, and provide a $500 grant.

A "No" vote would reject Christopher "MonteCristo" Mykles from the platform.
author: 0x5ea400d06Afe7aebae54216aDfD7a4bF5f15F993
